version_description:
• Fixes for several critical bugs in Scan, Selling Coach, Communications and notifications on iOS10.
• Capture and retouch product photos from your mobile device using the Photo Studio in the navigation menu.
• See the new ‘Slow-moving’ ASIN badge i

Manage Returns number indicator: Numbers will appear next to ‘Manage Returns’ on the home screen to inform you of how many return requests are pending authorization.

Bug fixes: Improvements for performance and stability.

Lost Buy Box push notifications: Turn on Lost Buy Box push notifications to receive a single notification if one of your products loses the Buy Box and your price is still within 5% of the new Buy Box price.

Lost Buy Box push notifications: Turn on Lost Buy Box push notifications to receive a single notification if one of your products loses the Buy Box and your price is still within 5% of the new Buy Box price.

Easily view competitive offers: Search for a product in ‘Add a Product.’ Tap ‘View Offers’ to see, sort, and filter current offers including condition, total price (Item Price + Shipping), Sales rank, and Seller rating.

Orders: Search your orders b

B2B Manage Credentials: Review and accept pending business credentials that your business has qualified for, such as Women or Minority-owned business. Go to B2B Central > Business Credentials > Accept. Available to registered Amazon Business Sellers

*Bug fix for the issue that caused an error when launching the Seller App.

*B2B Manage Credentials: Review and accept pending business credentials that your business has qualified for, such as Women or Minority-owned business. Go to B2B Central >

Cancel orders directly from the Order Details page.

Bug fixes: Improvements for performance and stability.
*We fixed a bug that was causing an error when accessing the scanner.
Bug fixes: Improvements for performance and stability.

Support for iPhone X.

Manage Inventory has new tools that can help you make pricing decisions. Tap Manage Inventory and select an item to see the new experience. You can also tap on a pricing opportunity or inventory alert.

View fee preview,

Campaign Manager 已面市。 现在您可以监控您的商品推广的绩效和管理现有活动。
- 使用图表比较各个活动在不同时间的表现，并查看各项指标，包括销量、支出、ACoS、点击次数和平均 CPC。
- 更新竞价和暂停个人活动。
- 更改每日预算或开始和结束日期。
- 修改广告组、广告和关键词。

Account Health: Monitor your account’s adherence to Amazon’s performance targets and policies. If your account is at risk of deactivation or has been deactivated, a banner at the top of the home screen will let you know the reason for deactivation. You ca

Single Sign-on (SSO) is here! SSO allows you to access any of your marketplaces with any set of account credentials. You can use the marketplace switcher on the left navigation menu to alternate between your marketplaces.

We’ve launched mobile account registration. Now you can register a new Seller account to get started selling in the U.S.A.
